name: T8020 National Membership Token
description: The T8020 National Membership Token, a limited-edition ERC-1155 token on the Polygon network, that grants exclusive access to the T8020 Community's premier events and governance in various cities. Powered by blockchain and AI-driven verification, it empowers holders to combat misinformation, fostering transparency and truth. Early adopters receive priority event access, exclusive educational content, and enhanced governance influence. Join a visionary community dedicated to trust and connection. Note: As of 4-22-25, the T8020 token is unavailable in CA, NY, TX, NJ, or WA; availability is subject to change based on T8020 token holders governance decisions.

metadataIntegrity.note: Metadata uploaded to IPFS at CID bafkreid5k3x2dp5tnjc27sqazccguzyvk3eftpfkewp2fewhkwfosghg2a and hash verified

frontendImplementation.purpose: Facilitates claiming the T8020 Membership Token (tokenId: 0) from the Edition Drop contract on Polygon using the React SDK.
frontendImplementation.instructions: Link your approved crypto wallet to the Polygon network and use the Claim Button on a T8020 Community-approved site to complete KYC verification, securing your exclusive token effortlessly.
